data.title: Flash of Genius
data.meta_description: Based on the true story of college professor and part-time inventor Robert Kearns' long battle with the U.S. automobile industry, Flash of Genius tells the tale of one man whose fight to receive recognition for his ingenuity would come at a heavy price. But this determined engineer refused to be silenced, and he took on the corporate titans in a battle that nobody thought he could win. (Universal Pictures)
data.text:

Directed By: Marc Abraham

Written By: Philip Railsback, John Seabrook
